text: well, granted, penny, your secondary sexual characteristics are reasonably bodacious. but priya is highly educated, she's an accomplished professional, and she comes from the culture that literally wrote the book on neat ways to have sex. whereas you, on the other hand, are a community college dropout who comes from the culture that wrote the book on tipping cows.
